sen.j: 碾茶（てんちゃ）は、蒸し製緑茶の一種。
sen.e: "Tencha" is a kind of steamed green tea.
"Tencha" is a kind of steamed green tea.
Tencha is a kind of steamed green tea.
sen.cmt: ダブルクォーテーションを削除しました。

sen.e: It is a raw material for maccha (powdered green tea.)
It's a raw material for maccha (powdered green tea).
It's a raw material for maccha (powdered green tea).

sen.j: 玉露と同様、収穫前に被覆した茶葉を蒸し、碾茶炉で乾燥して製造する。
sen.e: Like gyokuro (refined green tea,) tencha is made from tea leaves grown in shade shielded from the sunlight before being harvested, which are then steamed and dried in tencha-ro (a special furnace for tencha.)
Like gyokuro (refined green tea), tencha is made from tea leaves grown shielded from the sunlight before being harvested, which are then steamed and dried in tencha-ro (a special furnace for tencha).
Like gyokuro (refined green tea), tencha is made from tea leaves grown shielded from the sunlight before being harvested, which are then steamed and dried in tencha-ro (a special furnace for tencha).

sen.j: 煎茶のように茶葉を揉む工程が無いため、形状は青海苔に似ている。
sen.e: Unlike sencha (normal green tea,) its manufacturing process has no kneading (rolling) of tea leaves so that they are similar in shape to aonori (green lavers.)
Unlike sencha (normal green tea), its manufacturing process has no kneading (rolling) of tea leaves so that they're similar in shape to aonori (green lavers).
Unlike sencha (normal green tea), its manufacturing process has no kneading (rolling) of tea leaves so that they're similar in shape to aonori (green lavers).

sen.j: その香気は玉露同様独特のかぶせ香があり、適度に香ばしい。
sen.e: It has a moderate aroma of its own, like gyokuro, which it has obtained by covering tea leaves to shut out the sunlight before harvesting.
It has a moderate aroma of its own, like gyokuro, because the tea leaves are covered to shut out the sunlight before harvesting.
It has a moderate aroma of its own, like gyokuro, because the tea leaves are covered to shut out the sunlight before harvesting.

sen.j: 抹茶とはこの碾茶を石臼で挽いて粉末状にしたものである。
sen.e: Maccha (powdered green tea) is made by grinding this tencha by stone mills.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: Maccha (powdered green tea) is made by grinding this tencha in a stone mill.
Maccha (powdered green tea) is made by grinding this tencha in a stone mill.

sen.j: その保存に用いられたのが茶壺（葉茶壺）である。
sen.e: It is preserved in chatsubo (a tea canister) which is also called "hachatsubo" ("a canister for tea leaves.")
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: It is preserved in chatsubo (a tea canister), which is also called "hachatsubo" ("a canister for tea leaves").
It is preserved in chatsubo (a tea canister), which is also called hachatsubo (a canister for tea leaves).
sen.cmt: 一部ダブルクォーテーションを削除しました。

sen.j: 中国茶の一つである甜茶（てんちゃ）は別の物。
sen.e: There is another tencha, a kind of Chinese tea, which is different from Japanese tencha of this subject.
There is another tencha--a kind of Chinese tea--that is different from the Japanese tencha of this subject.
There is another tencha--a kind of Chinese tea--that is different from the Japanese tencha of this subject.
Amounts of production:
Production figures
Production figures

sen.j: 2006年度の全国総生産量は1650tで、都道府県別では京都府が789tと最も多く、次いで愛知県の473t、静岡県の183tである。
sen.e: The total production of tencha in Japan was 1,650 tons in the fiscal year 2006, in which 789 tons, the largest amount according to prefectures, was produced in Kyoto Prefecture followed by 473 tons in Aichi Prefecture and 183 tons in Shizuoka Prefecture.

The total production of tencha in Japan was 1,650 tons in the fiscal year 2006, in which 789 tons (the largest amount on a prefectural basis) was produced in Kyoto Prefecture, followed by 473 tons in Aichi Prefecture and 183 tons in Shizuoka Prefecture.

The total production of tencha in Japan was 1,650 tons in the fiscal year 2006, in which 789 tons (the largest amount on a prefectural basis) was produced in Kyoto Prefecture, followed by 473 tons in Aichi Prefecture and 183 tons in Shizuoka Prefecture.

sen.j: （出典「農林水産省統計・平成18年度茶生産量」）
sen.e: (Adapted from the "Statistics of Tea Production in 2006, compiled by the Ministry of Agriculture, Forestry and Fisheries")
(Adapted from the "Statistics of Tea Production in 2006," compiled by the Ministry of Agriculture, Forestry and Fisheries)
(Adapted from the 'Statistics of Tea Production in 2006,' compiled by the Ministry of Agriculture, Forestry and Fisheries)

sen.j: また、2006年度の市町村別生産量では、主要産地の愛知県西尾市が329t（東海農政局調べ）、京都府相楽郡和束町が264.5t（京都府調べ）となっている。
sen.e: Major productions by municipalities in the fiscal year 2006 were 329 tons from Nishio City, Aichi Prefecture, major producer of tencha, (according to the research by Tokai Regional Agricultural Administration Office) and 264.5 tons from Wazuka-cho Town, Soraku-gun, Kyoto Prefecture (according to the research by Kyoto Prefecture.)

Major production by municipalities in the fiscal year 2006 included 329 tons from Nishio City, Aichi Prefecture, a major producer of tencha, (according to research by the Tokai Regional Agricultural Administration Office) and 264.5 tons from Wazuka-cho Town, Soraku-gun, Kyoto Prefecture (according to research by Kyoto Prefecture).

Major production by municipalities in the fiscal year 2006 included 329 tons from Nishio City, Aichi Prefecture, a major producer of tencha, (according to research by the Tokai Regional Agricultural Administration Office) and 264.5 tons from Wazuka-cho, Soraku-gun, Kyoto Prefecture (according to research by Kyoto Prefecture).
